goal.en: Let students realize the principle and operations of various routing algorithms and the MPLS and SDN theories, applications, and performance.
goal.ch: 讓學生了解各種路由演算法之原理及運作方式，並理解MPLS技術與SDN之理論、應用、與效能。

content.en:
週次 內容
1 Course and Routing Overview
2 Routing Information Flooding (1)
3 Routing Information Flooding (2)
4 Routing Principle (1)
5 Routing Principle (2)
6 Quiz and Interior Routing Protocols
7 Exterior Routing Protocols
8 Mid. Exam.
9 Principle of Switching in IP
10 IP over ATM
11 IP Switching
12 Label Switching (Tag Switching, CSR, ARIS, MPLS)
13 Hierarchical Label Binding
14 Comparisons of Switching Schemes
15 Traffic Management of MPLS
16 SDN Architecture and Applications (1)
17 SDN Architecture and Applications (2)
18 Final Exam.
content.ch:
週次 內容
1 課程及路由概述
2 路由資訊散佈 (1)
3 路由資訊散佈 (2)
4 路由原理 (1)
5 路由原理 (2)
6 小考及內部路由協定
7 外部路由協定
8 期中考試
9 Switching IP原理
10 IP over ATM
11 IP Switching
12 標籤交換 (Tag Switching, CSR, ARIS, MPLS)
13 階層式標籤黏合
14 交換方法比較
15 MPLS訊務工程
16 SDN架構與應用 (1)
17 SDN架構與應用 (2)
18 期末考試

textbook.en: Textbook：自編 References： - Stephen A. Thomas, “IP Switching and Routing Essentials,” John Willey and Sons, Inc., 2001. - SDN相關規格：http://www.opennetworking.org/
textbook.ch: 教科書：自編 參考書： - Stephen A. Thomas, “IP Switching and Routing Essentials,” John Willey and Sons, Inc., 2001. - SDN相關規格：http://www.opennetworking.org/"

grading.en: 期中考: 35% 期末考：40% 小考或作業：15% 上課互動及出席狀況: 10%
grading.ch: 期中考: 35% 期末考：40% 小考或作業：15% 上課互動及出席狀況: 10%

flex_desc.en: In the 18th week, students shall survey the practical applications of SDN technology that introduced in the class.
flex_desc.ch: 第十八週請同學就本學期上課內容所提之SDN技術survey各種應用實例

en.competency: Problem Analysis and Independent Problem Solving

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 出席/課堂表現

en: Type:In-service Master's Program only.Faculty:College of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.
ch: 學制:限碩士在職專班。學院:限資電學院。
